DOC.brief_title: Combination Chemotherapy Plus Radiation Therapy Treating Children With Newly Diagnosed Brain Stem Glioma
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate efficacy vincristine plus etoposide concurrent radiotherapy one year survival child newly diagnose diffuse intrinsic brain stem glioma . II . Assess toxicity regimen patient population . OUTLINE : Induction : Patients receive oral etoposide daily day 1-21 vincristine IV day 1 , 8 , 15 . Treatment repeat every 4 week 2 course . Patients receive radiotherapy daily 6 week concurrently induction chemotherapy . Maintenance : One week induction therapy , patient receive vincristine IV day 1 8 oral etoposide daily day 1-21 . Treatment repeat every 4 week 10 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 30 patient accrue study within 2 year .
